gridworld.actor

Class Pacman

  • java.lang.Object
    • gridworld.actor.Actor
      • gridworld.actor.MovableActor
        • gridworld.actor.Pacman
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PacmanClosed

    public class Pacman
extends MovableActor
    Extends MovableActor. A Pacman eats pellets and tries to avoid Ghosts.

    • Field Detail

      • count

        protected static int count
        If the count is even that the pacman in moveTo should be a closedPacman. If the count is odd it should be a openPacman (regular)

      • currentDirection

        public static int currentDirection

      • newDirection

        public static int newDirection

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pacman

        Default Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(Location newLocation)
        Moves this actor to a new location. If there is another actor at the given location, it is removed.
        Precondition: (1) This actor is contained in a grid (2) newLocation is valid in the grid of this actor
        Specified by:
        moveTo in class MovableActor
        Parameters:
        newLocation - the new location

      • act

        public void act()
        If the Pacman can move, moves the pacman. See PacmanWorld keyPressed for more info
        Specified by:
        act in class Actor

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove()
        A Pacman can move if the if the grid Location is valid and the Actor is an instance of edible. Cannot turn if the Actor is an instance of Wall
        Overrides:
        canMove in class MovableActor
        Returns:
        true if can move, false otherwise.

      • getDirection

        public int getDirection()
        Gets the Direction
        Overrides:
        getDirection in class MovableActor
        Returns:
        the currentDirection

      • drawPacmanName

        public static void drawPacmanName()
        Draws a "P A C M A N" at the top of the grid
